identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.persona: Swiss Precision x Railway Industrial. Obsessed with grids, clarity, and tactile mechanical controls.
identity.theme_strategy: Light Theme (The 'Collector's Studio'). Clean, organized, museum-grade data presentation.
core_principles: Data as Art: Show the specs, don't hide them.
Tactile Utility: Buttons should feel like switches.
Heritage Modern: Classic railway aesthetics (timetables, tickets) interpreted through modern UI.
High Density, High Clarity: Dense tables, but massive breathing room around containers.

styles.h1: font-heading text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight uppercase text-primary
styles.h3: font-heading text-xl font-medium uppercase tracking-widest text-secondary
styles.label: font-mono text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-500

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode B for Dashboard, Mode A for Details)

cards.style: The 'Ticket' Look. White background, 1px solid border (slate-300). Optional: 'Notched' corners using clip-path for a mechanical feel.

buttons.primary: bg-brand-primary text-white font-mono uppercase tracking-widest px-6 py-3 rounded-sm shadow-sm hover:bg-red-700 active:translate-y-px
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-300 text-slate-700 font-mono uppercase tracking-widest px-6 py-3 rounded-sm hover:bg-slate-50 active:translate-y-px
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-brand-primary hover:bg-red-50 font-mono uppercase tracking-widest px-4 py-2

inputs.style: bg-white border border-slate-300 px-4 py-3 rounded-none font-mono text-sm focus:border-brand-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-brand-primary outline-none transition-colors
inputs.label_style: block text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-slate-500 mb-2

tables.style: Dense, technical. Header: bg-slate-100 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-600 border-b-2 border-slate-300. Rows: border-b border-slate-200 hover:bg-yellow-50 font-mono text-sm.

usage.dashboard_hero: Use 'hero_loco' with a 'multiply' blend mode overlay or matte finish.
usage.background_texture: Use 'blueprint_bg' as a subtle background pattern for the 'Digital/Decoders' section with 5% opacity.
usage.decoder_card: Use 'circuit_board' as the cover image for the Decoder management card.

visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Add a subtle SVG noise filter to the main background to break the digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.scanlines: Optional: Very subtle vertical lines (every 200px) to simulate a grid/logbook.
visual_enhancers.status_lights: Use CSS box-shadow glow for status indicators (green/red/yellow). e.g., 'shadow-[0_0_8px_rgba(56,161,105,0.6)]'

animations.page_transition: Simple fade-in (opacity 0 to 100) with slight slide-up (translate-y-4 to 0).
animations.hover_effects: Mechanical. Instant or very fast (<0.2s). No bouncy springs.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENTATION PRIORITY: Focus on the 'Collection List' and 'Locomotive Detail' views first. These are the core value props.
2. NOISE & TEXTURE: Do not just use flat colors. Add the noise texture to the body background.
3. DATA DENSITY: In the list view, do not waste space. Use a dense table layout. Collectors want to see many rows at once.
4. FORM DESIGN: Organize the 'Add/Edit Locomotive' form into logical groups (Basic Info, Technical Specs, Purchase Data). Use fieldsets with legends.
5. PREVIEW PANELS: When clicking a row in the list, try to open a 'Side Sheet' or 'Drawer' instead of a full page navigation if possible, to keep context.
6. USE SHADCN: Heavily customize the radius (set to 0 or 2px) and shadows to match the 'Industrial' look.
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure EVERY interactive element (buttons, inputs, rows) has a data-testid attribute.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use grids.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
